version_description: Small bug fixies
Small bug fixies

iPad version is finally here!

Instantly add Tinkoff cards (Visa and MasterCard) to Apple Wallet.
Subscriptions to and one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS.
Subscriptions to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service.
Arranging for a meeting in the app to get a card after its approval.
New screen for money transfers to individuals: it is not who you transfer the money to but rather how you do it. Transfers from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards are still available with a zero fee (up to RUB 20,000 per month).
New transfer options using a phone number: send your money to any bank, no details required.
Your new contacts in the payments interface: you will know which of your friends are now Tinkoff users!
Opportunity to change card payment confirmation – by PIN or by signature.
And many other improvements.

iPad version is finally here!

Instantly add Tinkoff cards (Visa and MasterCard) to Apple Wallet.
Subscriptions to and one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS.
Subscriptions to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service.
Arranging for a meeting in the app to get a card after its approval.
New screen for money transfers to individuals: it is not who you transfer the money to but rather how you do it. Transfers from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards are still available with a zero fee (up to RUB 20,000 per month).
New transfer options using a phone number: send your money to any bank, no details required.
Your new contacts in the payments interface: you will know which of your friends are now Tinkoff users!
Opportunity to change card payment confirmation – by PIN or by signature.
And many other improvements.

3.2.5
iPad version is finally here!

Instantly add Tinkoff cards (Visa and MasterCard) to Apple Wallet.
Subscriptions to and one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS.
Subscriptions to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service.
Arranging for a meeting in the app to get a card after its approval.
New screen for money transfers to individuals: it is not who you transfer the money to but rather how you do it. Transfers from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards are still available with a zero fee (up to RUB 20,000 per month)
New transfer options using a phone number: send your money to any bank, no details required.
Your new contacts in the payments interface: you will know which of your friends are now Tinkoff users!
Opportunity to change card payment confirmation – by PIN or by signature.
And many other improvements.
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

The long-awaited feature enabling debit card holders to choose categories with increased cash back.
Improved Event List section for iPad users.
Introduction of changes to the card PIN.
Separate tab for chatting with the bank.
Description and key details of the companies in the Payments section.
Support of new loyalty programmes (for holders of All Airlines debit cards and all Ulmart cards).
Peer-to-peer FX transfers (the repeated transfer and bookmark features to come soon).
Account and transaction statement requests (available in the profile or the account menu and in the transaction details, respectively).
New Security Questions section.
Transfers to the CONTACT Payment System.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Transfers to foreign bank cards.

Auto login with Touch ID: after unlocking your phone with Touch ID, you have ten seconds to log into the Tinkoff app without additional authorisation via fingerprint or access code.

New common-style input field to enter the amount when making payments and transfers.

Option to send a request to open a brokerage account.

Strelka card balance check during top-up (including via a template).

– New design (iOS 11 style)
– Transfers to individuals and the option to find your bank details using Siri
– Separate account and card screens with detailed information and shortcuts
– On-screen limitations for free transfers to third-party cards (for current accounts)
– Cash back estimates (for current accounts)
– New Event List: transaction details, combined transactions (inter-account and identical transactions are grouped), MCCs for transactions
– New expense section with detailed tags, general search
– Bill/invoice scanning to speed up utility, fine and tax payments, no bank details required
– Automatic payment of taxes, fines, electricity, utility and phone bills
– In-chat tips for instant response
– Transactions abroad – notify the bank of travelling outside Russia
– Various improvements and bug fixes

Somebody’s April Fool’s Day joke turns into our New Year’s gift!
Welcome Tinkoff Stories, fascinating themed collections and practical tips for any occasion, carefully handpicked just for you. And, of course, our comprehensive reviews of Tinkoff’s mobile app and other financial services.

Tinkoff Mobile users can now view their mobile account and virtual card details.

We also added a new Invite Your Friend section – recommend Tinkoff to your friends and get bonuses.

Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

Yours, Tinkoff Mobile Banking Team

Bug fixes

Request for Money now includes a crowdfunding feature where you can solicit financial contributions from the general public.
The payments section has been upgraded once again. Peer-to-peer money transfers now break down by phone number, contract number (also by using a QR code), transfers to people nearby (by searching for recipients via Bluetooth). Send Cash has been moved to the Actions section which now covers money transfers to Russian Post office and via Contact or Unistream.
To view FX rates, you should now tap More and then Info. Tinkoff Insurance policies are also available for purchase.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

A new Actions button on a Pay tab with Request Money, Scan Invoice and Withdraw Cash options. (Some of new features will be delivered partially and become available for every customer during two weeks from now).
Redesigned interface of accounts carousel and ‘Card-to-card’ screen: add a new currency and order new cards from accounts screen.
Merchants’ brand icons in push-notifications.
Application for Individual Investment Account and Cash-Secured Loan.
A summarized balance of the investment account and Individual Investment Account in the Investments section on the main screen.
A new Documents section is available in Wallet on Other tab
Family banking upgrade: share your account info with other Tinkoff client. Choose whether you want to show a balance only or provide a full access.
Now you may share your favorite payment from template’s settings.
Choose between regular (updated on the first day each month) and indefinite card limits.
And many other improvements.
We improved P2P payments using a phone number and fixed a few bugs

We are happy to introduce our new debit card - Tinkoff Junior :
∙ Apply for a card for your child
∙ Set tasks and pay rewards when tasks are completed
∙ Top up the card from your account or from another bank card
∙ Use “Where is the child?” service


On top of that, we added an icon for purchases with till slips in Events List.

We are happy to introduce our new debit card - Tinkoff Junior :
∙ Apply for a card for your child
∙ Set tasks and pay rewards when tasks are completed
∙ Top up the card from your account or from another bank card
∙ Use “Where is the child?” service


On top of that, we added an icon for purchases with till slips in Events List.
ATM section optimization
ATM section optimization

We have updated the Entertainment Section.
Now you can buy tickets for concerts or theatres, browse restaurant selections, sort restaurants by average spending per customer or cuisine type.
Besides, we've added small improvements and fixed bugs.

We have updated the Entertainment Section.
Now you can buy tickets for concerts or theatres, browse restaurant selections, sort restaurants by average spending per customer or cuisine type.
Besides, we've added small improvements and fixed bugs.

Now you can add a new currency for your Tinkoff Black Card in the 'Open new product' menu.
Build a complete portfolio with Tinkoff Investments robo-advisor.
Buy movie tickets, tickets for concerts or theatres more conveniently.
Also we've added small improvements and fixed bugs.

Updated mobile number payment options and contact screen offer a faster and easier way to send money to any bank.

Shopping section: an enhanced experience with shopping mall navigation and a guide on sales and discounts.

Book hotels and flights and get cashback at https://www.tinkoff.ru/travel in our new Travel section of the Entertainment menu.

And many other improvements.

Request for Money now includes a crowdfunding feature where you can solicit financial contributions from the general public.
The payments section has been upgraded once again. Peer-to-peer money transfers now break down by phone number, contract number (also by using a QR code), transfers to people nearby (by searching for recipients via Bluetooth). Send Cash has been moved to the Actions section which now covers money transfers to Russian Post office and via Contact or Unistream.
To view FX rates, you should now tap More and then Info. Tinkoff Insurance policies are also available for purchase.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

We are excited to release the first version of Tinkoff SuperApp 5.0 that is designed to bring together a wealth of services to cater to your most versatile needs.

What's new?

Total app redesign with the light theme (the dark one will be coming soon) .

A genuinely new onboarding experience for Tinkoff’s new customers .

New tabs added for applications and Tinkoff products .

Entertainment and Orders now found under the separate Services tab.

Quests, Cleaning Services, Health and Beauty now featured in certain regions, with reservations and appointments available directly from the app.

Events now accessible from the home screen .

Story sharing via a link is enabled (including for saved ones).

All cinemas you attended now appear at the top of your screen. Cinemas can be saved to favourites .

Early loan repayment now available, in full or in part.

SWIFT payments and a full-scale crowdfunding service added .

And much more…

Events now accessible from the home screen .

Story sharing via a link is enabled (including for saved ones).

All cinemas you attended now appear at the top of your screen. Cinemas can be saved to favourites .

Early loan repayment now available, in full or in part.

SWIFT payments and a full-scale crowdfunding service added .

And much more…

5.0.1
Bug fixes

5.0
We are excited to release the first version of Tinkoff SuperApp 5.0 that is designed to bring together a wealth of services to cater to your most versatile needs.

What's new?

Total app redesign with the light theme (the dark one will be coming soon) .

A genuinely new onboarding experience for Tinkoff’s new customers .

New tabs added for applications and Tinkoff products .

Entertainment and Orders now found under the separate Services tab.

Quests, Cleaning Services, Health and Beauty now featured in certain regions, with reservations and appointments available directly from the app.

Events now accessible from the home screen .

Story sharing via a link is enabled (including for saved ones).

All cinemas you attended now appear at the top of your screen. Cinemas can be saved to favourites .

Early loan repayment now available, in full or in part.

SWIFT payments and a full-scale crowdfunding service added .

And much more…

5.0.2
Bug fixes

5.0
We are excited to release the first version of Tinkoff SuperApp 5.0 that is designed to bring together a wealth of services to cater to your most versatile needs.

What's new?

Total app redesign with the light theme (the dark one will be coming soon).

Early loan repayment now available, in full or in part.

SWIFT payments and a full-scale crowdfunding service added.

And much more…

The dark theme is now available to users of iOS 13 and above. The Tinkoff app changes user interface either to the light or dark theme depending on the system settings.
We added changing network carrier (MNP) to Tinkoff Mobile’s SIM card application form.

The dark theme is now available to users of iOS 13 and above. The Tinkoff app changes user interface either to the light or dark theme depending on the system settings.
We added changing network carrier (MNP) to Tinkoff Mobile’s SIM card application form.

Faster loading thanks to quicker authorisation.
Re-issued and additional cards can now be added to Apple Wallet immediately, even before the physical card is delivered.
Improved scanning functionality for receipt barcodes. Using receipt photos for payment is now possible.
Updated restaurant design (sharing is now available).
More filters for movies (by subtitles and 3D/4DX/IMAX).
Users with car loans can now add car details via the app.

Faster loading thanks to quicker authorisation.
Re-issued and additional cards can now be added to Apple Wallet immediately, even before the physical card is delivered.
Improved scanning functionality for receipt barcodes. Using receipt photos for payment is now possible.
Updated restaurant design (sharing is now available).
More filters for movies (by subtitles and 3D/4DX/IMAX).
Users with car loans can now add car details via the app.

We have added notifications to remind our customers of the upcoming payments on their loans and credit cards.
You can also set the map filter to see top-up locations opened during the quarantine.

Saving money is a breeze with the Investing Jar:
– top it up in small increments every time you buy something;
– put aside your cashback and interest accrued on the account balance;
– set up regular transfers.
To keep you protected from inflation, your savings are invested in Tinkoff’s ETFs – pre-built portfolios of gold, government bonds, and blue-chip stocks. The Investing Jar can be used free of charge and with any currency.

Motor hull insurance (MHI) and compulsory motor third-party liability (CMTPL) policies can now be extended in the app.

Sole proprietor registration added to new products.

Now it is even easier to join Tinkoff Mobile: go to the New Product section and opt for plastic SIM or eSIM. The latter will be opened instantly, while the former will be delivered at your convenience.

We will help you find the right restaurant for any occasion. Just answer a few questions and get a list of venues based on your preferences. You can also add the restaurants that you liked to Favourites.

Hotels booked via Tinkoff Travel are now available in the general list of orders in the Services section.

We have added a theme switcher that can be found under the “More” tab in the app settings. Options are available: you can choose to always use the dark theme, always use the light theme or go with the operating system's default.

For parents, an option to share their child’s account has been added. This enables the second parent to access and top up the account, manage tasks and track the child’s location.

Money requests can now be created for any spending transaction, not just purchases made with a card, as was the case previously.

— Viewing documents by transaction has been made more convenient. You can now view documents directly in the app and forward them to email or messengers through the standard system menu.

— Now you can transfer money to Tajikistan by phone number. We are expanding our geography with plans to add new countries.
— We have added a tax report option for the Investing Jar. You can find the Reports section by clicking on the cog icon in the Investing Jar interface.
— Good news for parents using Tinkoff Junior! You can now see which one of your children owns any given bonus by going to the More section and then clicking on the Bonuses icon. If you have several children, it will be so much easier for you to identify the savings of each of them.

– You can now hide your balance in the app. Turning your phone face down for a sec will blur the figures and make them unreadable. To make the amounts visible on the screen again, give it another turn downwards.
– You no longer need to give us a heads-up for your trips abroad – we have found a way to trace the transaction back to you.
– Child tickets are now available for certain movie showtimes.

– When you pay for your mobile, we will suggest a specific amount – enough to pay your tariff. So far, this covers only Tinkoff Mobile, but we will add other operators soon.

– We launched a new section – My Car – featuring everything a car owner may ever need: insurance, fines, fuel, and cashback loyalty programmes. You can add your car and track important data.
